Project Management

Build a free intranet / project management dashboard using Google Sites software for completely free!

Intranet Project Management Dashboard

Do you want to learn how to create your own business intranet / project management dashboard absolutely free?

Help your teams share important information and stay connected with powerful social functions

How about creating an internal project management site for a client project?

And do you want the same system that many large corporates use for free?

Build A Project Management Dashboard

In this course we will show you how to setup and use Google Sites to create an intranet that functions as a project management dashboard with a free gmail account!

We will take you step by step through that process and help you create a simple yet powerful business tool that is only limited by your imagination…

We will also show you how to set your intranet up so that you can decide who sees what - giving you complete control over company data!

No Coding Required

We will use a simple project based lesson structure for this course

And all this with no coding…

So just need to follow along and copy what we are doing!

Who Is This Course For?

This course is for businesses or entrepreneurs that want to build an intranet or project management dashboard with no budget.

This course is suitable for anyone who wants to learn how to use Google Sites.

What Will You Be Able To Do After Taking The Course?

By the end of the training you will know how to:

Build a project management dashboard using Google Sites

Build a company intranet for free

Set permissions for security so you choose who accesses content

Add Google resources like spreadsheets, documents and reports

Create a social layer to your company's intranet

What Is Covered In The Course?

  • Site Design Layout
  • Using A Mind Map For A Site Design Layout
  • Example Site Build
  • Creating A Site
  • Styling A Site
  • Building Ar Home Page
  • Creating Announcement Pages
  • Creating List Pages
  • Creating Task Lists
  • Importing A Company Calendar
  • Styling A Page
  • Adding Side Bar Content
  • Building A Project Page
  • Creating A Company Forum
  • Creating A Training Page
  • Creating A Contact Page
  • Linking The Navigation
  • Setting Permissions
